snippet.title: Her Name Was Fire | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist Her Name Was Fire: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2083840/Her_Name_Was_Fire/

Her Name Was Fire is a Tarotpunk twin stick roguelike with deck building elements where you progressively unlock spells and upgrades to defeat hordes of void creatures. Survive the 5 stages of grief and vanquish the Major Allegories.

Music by Karl Casey @ White Bat Audio

🐦 Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/TissueInu 
🔥Wishlist HNWF: https://cutt.ly/ALnjr42
🎧 Join our Discord Community: https://discord.gg/MCV3pcKGZh

#indiegame #roguelike #hernamewasfire
